document.full_text: private equity firm apollo global management llc's  first-quarter earnings rose fivefold from a year earlier as the value of its investments increased, in its first quarterly report since its march ipo.
document.title: apollo earnings up, in first report since ipo
lines_and_colors: private equity firm apollo global management llc's  first-quarter earnings rose fivefold from a year earlier as the value of its investments increased, in its first quarterly report since its march ipo.
